net.getcloudengine

Class CloudUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.getcloudengine.CloudUser

  • public class CloudUser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent an app user. Allows new user account creation, logging in and out of a user, query currently logged in user, requesting resetting of a user's password.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudUser()
      Constructs a new CloudUser object.
      CloudUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Constructs a new CloudUser object and sets the username and password as provided in the arguments.

      Retrive the user object which corresponds to the given sessionid String in the current thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudUser

        public CloudUser()
        Constructs a new CloudUser object.

      • CloudUser

        public CloudUser(java.lang.String username,
         java.lang.String password)
        Constructs a new CloudUser object and sets the username and password as provided in the arguments.
        Parameters:
        username - Username to be set for the object
        password - Password to be set for the object

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated()
        Returns true if this user has been authenticated by the server else false.

      • signUp

        public void signUp()
        Creates a new account for the user on the server in the current thread.
        Throws:
        CloudException - if unable to connect to server or an account with the given username already exists.

      • signUpInBackground

        public void signUpInBackground()
        Creates a new account for the user on the server in a background thread

      • signUpInBackground

        public void signUpInBackground(SignupCallback callback)
        Creates a new account for the user on the server in a background thread
        Parameters:
        callback - Instance of SignupCallback. The done function of the class will be called when the request is completed.
        Throws:
        CloudException - if username or password are not set or if the server is not reachable or server didn't return expected response

      • getUser

        public static CloudUser getUser(java.lang.String sessionid)
        Retrive the user object which corresponds to the given sessionid String in the current thread.
        Parameters:
        sessionid - The sessionid string corresponding to the user which was returned while signing up the user or last login of the user.
        Returns:
        the CloudUser instance corresponding to the given session id
        Throws:
        CloudException - if server is not reachable or server didn't return expected response.

      • getUserInBackground

        public static CloudUser getUserInBackground(java.lang.String sessionid,
                            LoginCallback callback)
        Retrieve the user object which corresponds to the given sessionid String in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        sessionid - The sessionid string corresponding to the user which was returned while signing up the user or last login of the user.
        callback - an instance of LoginCallback. The done function of the object will be called upon the completion of the request.
        Returns:
        the CloudUser instance corresponding to the given session id
        Throws:
        CloudException - if server is not reachable or server didn't return expected response.

      • requestPasswordReset

        public static void requestPasswordReset(java.lang.String email)
        Request the server to reset the password of the user with the given email. The request will be sent in the current thread. The server will send an email to the given email id with the link to reset the password.
        Parameters:
        email - email id of the user account whose password needs to be reset.
        Throws:
        CloudException - if the email is not valid or server is not reachable.

      • requestPasswordResetInBackground

        public static void requestPasswordResetInBackground(java.lang.String email)
        Request the server to reset the password of the user with the given email. The request is sent in a background thread. The server will send an email to the given email id with the link to reset the password.
        Parameters:
        email - email id of the user account whose password needs to be reset.
        Throws:
        CloudException - if the email is not valid or server is not reachable.

      • requestPasswordResetInBackground

        public static void requestPasswordResetInBackground(java.lang.String email,
                                    PasswordResetCallback callback)
        Request the server to reset the password of the user with the given email. The request is sent in a background thread. The server will send an email to the given email id with the link to reset the password.
        Parameters:
        email - email id of the user account whose password needs to be reset.
        callback - instance of PasswordResetCallback. The done function of the object will be called upon the completion of the request
        Throws:
        CloudException - if the email is not valid or server is not reachable.

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Set the username of this user object
        Parameters:
        username - The username string

      • setEmail

        public void setEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Set the email of this user object
        Parameters:
        email - The email id string of the user

        public void setFirstname(java.lang.String first_name)

        Parameters:
        first_name - first name of the user

        Set the last name of this user object
        Parameters:
        last_name - last name of the user

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set the password of this user object
        Parameters:
        password - the password string

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns the username of this user object
        Returns:
        username The username string

      • getEmail

        public java.lang.String getEmail()
        Returns the email id of this user object
        Returns:
        email The email id string

      • getSessionToken

        public java.lang.String getSessionToken()
        Returns the session token of this user object available from the last login
        Returns:
        session id string

      • login

        public static CloudUser login(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
        Login into the server using the given username and password as credentials. The login request will be sent in the current thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the username string to be used to login
        password - the password string to be used to login
        Returns:
        CloudUser object corresponding to the logged in user.

      • loginInBackground

        public static void loginInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Login into the server using the given username and password as credentials. The login request will be sent in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the username string to be used to login
        password - the password string to be used to login

      • loginInBackground

        public static void loginInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     LoginCallback callback)
        Login into the server using the given username and password as credentials. The login request will be sent in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the username string to be used to login
        password - the password string to be used to login
        callback - LoginCallback instance. The done method of the object will be called upon the completion of the request.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Logout a currently logged in user. The logout request is sent in the current thread.

      • logoutInBackground

        public void logoutInBackground()
        Logout a currently logged in user. The logout request will be sent in a background thread.

      • logoutInBackground

        public void logoutInBackground(LogoutCallback callback)
        Logout a currently logged in user. The logout request will be sent in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        callback - instance of LogoutCallback. The done method of the class will be called upon the completion of the request.
